DOC.brief_summary: In 19th century , researcher find difference energy content macronutrients ( protein , carbohydrate fat ) elicit different response amount calorie individual burn per day . It demonstrate protein metabolic advantage compare macronutrients ( carbohydrate fat ) . Since finding , researcher world start study diet differ macronutrient distribution could result different response energy metabolism . Diets high amount protein ( i.e . meat , egg , dairy product , grain ) become popular , study show people eat high quantity protein lose weight fat mass , maintain weight loss , burn calorie per day . The investigator hypothesize give high amount protein healthy woman increase amount calorie fat burn per day , increase satiety , improve health marker compare normal diet . The increased protein level achieve use nutrition supplement consist soy protein , yogurt honey . To test , investigator plan divide participant two group : one eat normal diet diet high amount protein one half day . After one month change group eat diet period time . During period consume diet ( 1.5 day ) , participant stay inside whole body calorimetry suite , similar hotel bedroom able inform precise way amount calorie participant burn burn fat . Additionally , meal participant answer questionnaire appetite sensation blood also collect analyze health marker .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact High Protein Diet Substrate Oxidation Energy Metabolism
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study investigate impact high protein diet ( achieve use high protein supplement ) versus standard diet substrate oxidation energy expenditure use state-of-the-art live-in whole body calorimetry unit ( WBCU ) . This study acute randomize , control , cross-over trial . Healthy woman ( n=24 ) receive run-in diet three day randomly allocate one follow group : 1 ) Control group receive eucaloric standard diet ( 55 % carbohydrate , 15 % protein , 30 % lipid ) ; 2 ) High-protein group : eucaloric high protein diet ( 35 % carbohydrate , 40 % protein , 25 % fat ) construct around soy protein-based meal replacement . The wash-out period approximately one month . While receive diet WBCU 32 hour , participant ' overall change energy metabolism include respiratory quotient assess . Additional assessment include metabolic blood marker ( glucose , insulin , lipid panel , peptide tyrosine-tyrosine , ghrelin , leptin , free glycerol , free fatty acid ) , appetite sensation ( hunger satiety ) . Body composition energy requirement assess baseline use dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry indirect calorimetry , respectively . It expect high-protein diet increase lipid oxidation , energy expenditure , favorable change additional marker compare control group .
DOC.criteria: Healthy ; Nonsmoker ; Female ; Aged 18 30 year ; Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 24.9 kg/m² ( preferably 20 24.9 kg/m² ) ; Regular menstrual cycle ( last 25 35 day ) . Have previously diagnose kind disease ; Are take medication may alter energy metabolism body composition ; Are lactose , gluten and/or soy allergic/intolerant ; Follow vegetarian , vegan restrictive dietary pattern ; Are pregnant lactating ; Have use nutritional supplement past two month ; Perform hour per day leisure time physical activity seven hour per week strenuous activity ; Have nuclear medicine scan injection Xray dye past week ; Have barium test/exam last two week ; Claustrophobia .
